Context¶

1. Specifications¶

  • App specifications

  • Doc specifications

2. Project description¶

Overhaul of the modular architecture in the GitHub repository

  1. Addressing various technical debts in the project

  2. Dockerize

  3. Implementation of a CI/CD pipeline using CircleCI and deployment on Render

  4. Monitoring the application and tracking errors through Sentry

  5. Creation of the technical documentation for the application using Read The Docs and Sphinx

3. System Configuration¶

  • Windows 11

  • Visual Studio Code 1.93.0

  • Powershell

  • Python 3.12.2

  • pip 24.2

4. Developement packages¶

During local development, we use .venv

  • django 5.0.8

    • SECRET_KEY : Django secret key

    • SENTRY_DSN : Sentry project URL

    • ALLOWED_HOSTS : enter allowed host

    • DEBUG : select True or False

    • DOCKERHUB_PASSWORD : Docker account password

    • DOCKERHUB_USERNAME : Docker account username

    • HOOK_RENDER (acquired from Render)

5. Test packages¶

  • pytest 8.3.2

  • pytest-cov 5.0.0

  • pytest-django 4.8.0

  • flake8 7.1.1

  • flake8-html 0.4.3

for test coverage use :
$ pytest --cov=. tests/

6. Production packages¶

  • gunicorn 23.0.0

  • whitenoise 6.7.0

  • sentry-sdk 2.13.0

7. Database models¶

class Address(models.Model):

  • number = models.PositiveIntegerField(validators=[MaxValueValidator(9999)])

  • street = models.CharField(max_length=64)

  • city = models.CharField(max_length=64)

  • state = models.CharField(max_length=2, validators=[MinLengthValidator(2)])

  • zip_code = models.PositiveIntegerField(validators=[MaxValueValidator(99999)])

  • country_iso_code = models.CharField(max_length=3, validators=[MinLengthValidator(3)])

class Letting(models.Model):

  • title = models.CharField(max_length=256)

  • address = models.OneToOneField(Address, on_delete=models.CASCADE)

class Profile(models.Model):

  • user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name=’profiles_profile’)

  • favorite_city = models.CharField(max_length=64, blank=True)
